hadiths.text: Narrated Abu Huraira:The Prophet (ﷺ) said, "If somebody eats or drinks forgetfully then he should complete his fast, for what he has eaten or drunk, has been given to him by Allah

chapter.ara-name: باب الصَّائِمِ إِذَا أَكَلَ أَوْ شَرِبَ نَاسِيًا
chapter.eng-name: If a person observing Saum ate or drank forgetfully
